category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA_file_rename
preference.preference_description: Controls whether AutoCAD filenames will be renamed to their ItemID value during save to Teamcenter. Possible values: 0 - Do not rename file on save 1 - Rename file on save with format depending on TCAA_file_name_rule option (Default)
